name: Project Heir - WIP
description:
Hello everybody!

This is a large scope passion project I started my first year of college and it has evolved a lot over the 5 years I have been working on it.

This is the first public demo I have released, but I post updates regularly on my twitter: https://twitter.com/SoulPalmGames

I have released this demo to show off the first level of the game, as well as the combat mechanics I have finished so far. Any and all feedback is welcomed! 

------------------------------------------------

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Select/Shoot

X - Dodge/Slide

C - Throw Weapon (Only Secondaries)

V - Melee/Punch

A - Reload

S - Swap Weapon

D - Heal/Throw Grenade (Right now it does both oops)
